experiment: Transfer DefensiveTokens Llama-3 -> Llama-3.1 via Procrustes + Tiny-Adapt
method: Procrustes alignment + tiny-adapt (fine-tune 5 DT embeddings for 200 steps with StruQ loss)

compute_cost.speedup_vs_full_training: ~17x faster (55 min vs ~16 GPU-hours for full DT training)

comparison_with_forward_transfer.observation: After tiny-adapt, reverse transfer also achieves strong defense (1.9% ASR = measured full DT performance). The asymmetry is resolved.
